How can I Like a Content?|

To Like any content, click on the &ldquo
column3: button available on the Content Profile page. You can also use&nbsp
column4: the Like button available to you, when you Hover your mouse on any content in the &ldquo
column6:
section under the Likes navigation.

To Like your friends&rsquo
column9:
option appearing in your activity feed for the post. Liking a post will let your friends know that you like it.

How can I unlike a content?|

To unlike a content, click on Unlike button available on the Content Profile Page. You can also use the Unlike button available to you, when you Hover your mouse on any content in &ldquo
column6:
option appearing in your activity feed for the post you had liked earlier.

column1:
My problem is not listed above. What should I do now?|

If your problem is not listed above, then please contact us by filling the &ldquo
column5:
